name: Zero Sum Game
description:
Zero Sum Game

A Craftswoman needs help: More than a year of her memories have been erased, and she fears she was involved with something untoward. As a new graduate of the Hidden Schools, you have been assigned to the case. 

Explore colorful locations, from a magical lawyer's tower, to a gambling club seething with trickery and desperation, to the not-so-dry records of a city ruled by gods of fire and moonlight. Solve puzzles and unlock clues to unravel the mystery hidden in your client's lost memories. You are a stranger to this city...and you will soon find it is stranger than you could have imagined. 

Welcome to Alt Coulumb.

From the makers of Eldritch Detective: The Case of the Startled Salon comes a new multimedia fanwork, Zero Sum Game. This year's project is set in the world of Max Gladstone's Craft Sequence, with escape room-style audio and visual puzzles.

Play Time: 3-5 hours
Total Audio Time: 2 hours, 11 minutes
Number of puzzles: 16
Warnings: Horror themes/imagery
